remarks: Define the relation between a module and its linearly independent subsets.  (Contributed by AV, 12-Apr-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 24-Apr-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 30-Jul-2019.)
statement:
df-lininds $p |- linIndS = { <. s , m >. | ( s e. ~P ( Base ` m ) /\ A. f e. ( ( Base ` ( Scalar ` m ) ) ^m s ) ( ( f finSupp ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` m ) ) /\ ( f ( linC ` m ) s ) = ( 0g ` m ) ) -> A. x e. s ( f ` x ) = ( 0g ` ( Scalar ` m ) ) ) ) } $.
$d f m s x $.
